title: Inconsolable Widow, The, La Vedova Inconsolabile 1973

sources.title: Inconsolable Widow, The, La Vedova Inconsolabile 1973
sources.description: Edwige plays Catrina Prevosti, a widow who has to produce an heir before she can inherit her dead husband's wealth.  It is truly astounding the number of movies that Fenech made between 1968 and 1984 and the number of times she appeared nude in them. Not all of them were sex comedies, she did appear in a few more serious movies as well.  Italian with English subtitles
